ygData.msgSnippet: A stasis pod came flying down to the Earth.  It went down and down, and finally landed by the Nile River in Egypt.  Inside was a bot named Decadel. The pod

	A stasis pod came flying down to the Earth.  It went down and down, and
finally landed by the Nile River in Egypt.  Inside was a bot named Decadel.
 The pod hadn't found a beast mode yet.
